text: The 1976 Oregon State Beavers football team represented Oregon State University in the Pacific-8 Conference (Pac-8) during the 1976 NCAA Division I football season. In their first season under head coach Craig Fertig, the Beavers compiled a 2–10 record (1–6 in Pac-8, last), and were outscored 325 to 179. Home games were played on campus at Parker Stadium in Corvallis, Oregon. ==Schedule== ==Roster== : ==References== Oregon State Category:Oregon State Beavers football seasons Category:1976 in sports in Oregon
title: 1976 Oregon State Beavers football team
